name: Donald Anderson
personality: Focused and thorough, but can be stubborn at times.
story: Donald Anderson joined the army right after finishing high school. He excelled in marksmanship and was eventually recruited into the Special Forces. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional skills as a sniper. He served in several intelligence gathering missions and was instrumental in taking down a major terrorist group in the Middle East. He has been married for four years and has a son.
